name: Visual Novel Sisters
description:
Visual Novel Sisters is a text-visual story based on a Japanese tale of two sisters.
This game is a storytelling game.

SISTERS


Once upon a time, two sisters lived in the same area. The eldest was a beautiful and kind girl, and the youngest was very angry.

TRAVEL IN THE MOUNTAINS

Two sisters decided to go to the mountains to collect acorns.

STRANGE SURPRISE

However, everything turned out to be far from simple ... In this story you will find out what happened next.

GAME FEATURES:

  • 2 girl characters
  • Spectacular mountainous spaces
  • Ability to move in space using controls
  • Narrative with an unusual ending
  • 10 thematic musical compositions
